code: var _require=require('@common/global-config'),SESSION_SYSTEM=_require.SESSION_SYSTEM;var calculateSemester=function calculateSemester(ms){var date=new Date(ms);var semesters=[{name:"Fall",start:70,end:100},{name:"Spring",start:0,end:45},{name:"Summer",start:45,end:70}];var quarters=[{name:"Fall",start:75,end:100},{name:"Winter",start:0,end:30},{name:"Spring",start:30,end:55},{name:"Summer",start:55,end:75}];var currentYear=date.getUTCFullYear();var nextYear=date.getUTCFullYear()+1;var _baseline=new Date(0);_baseline.setUTCFullYear(currentYear);var baseline=_baseline.getTime();var _eoy=new Date(0);_eoy.setUTCFullYear(nextYear);var eoy=_eoy.getTime();var progress=(ms-baseline)/(eoy-baseline)*100;var session=(SESSION_SYSTEM==="SEMESTER"?semesters:quarters).find(function(_ref){var start=_ref.start,end=_ref.end;return progress>=start&&progress<end;});return"".concat(session.name," ").concat(currentYear);};module.exports={calculateSemester:calculateSemester};
